name: Chicken Sandwich 6 pieces
description: A delightful platter of six mini chicken sandwich triangles, filled with creamy chicken salad or sliced chicken and crisp lettuce. Perfect for sharing or a light meal.

name: Club Sandwich 2 Pieces
description: A classic triple-decker club sandwich with layers of tender chicken or turkey, crispy bacon (or alternative), fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and mayonnaise. Served as two hearty pieces.

name: Egg & Cheese Sandwich
description: A simple yet satisfying sandwich featuring fluffy scrambled or fried egg and melted cheese, nestled between slices of soft bread. A great choice for breakfast or a light lunch.

name: Grilled Panini Sandwich 2 Pieces
description: Warm, pressed panini sandwich with a crispy golden exterior, filled with delicious ingredients like grilled chicken, melted mozzarella, and flavorful pesto or other spreads. Served as two perfectly grilled halves.

name: Vegetable Cream Cheese Sandwich
description: A refreshing and light sandwich filled with smooth, tangy cream cheese and a medley of crisp, fresh vegetables like cucumber, carrots, bell peppers, and lettuce. A healthy and tasty option.
